title: [bug] cli: tauri icon fails but returns exit code 0

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

When `tauri icon` fails (at least in this case) it returns exit code `0`, should return `1`



### Reproduction

1. Have a non-square icon like this:
![app-icon](https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/assets/19424456/e02593cc-cf07-4ae7-86ab-a3431e6912b8)
2. Run `tauri icon`
3. it fails, but exit code is 0



### Expected behavior

That the exit code is 1

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
[✔] Environment
    - OS: Manjaro 23.1.4 X64
    ✔ webkit2gtk-4.1: 2.42.5
    ✔ rsvg2: 2.57.1
    ✔ rustc: 1.77.2 (25ef9e3d8 2024-04-09)
    ✔ cargo: 1.77.2 (e52e36006 2024-03-26)
    ✔ rustup: 1.26.0 (2023-11-14)
    ✔ Rust toolchain: 1.77-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (default)
    - node: 20.11.1
    - pnpm: 8.6.2
    - yarn: 1.22.10
    - npm: 10.2.4

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.1
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.1
    - wry [RUST]: 0.35.2
    - tao [RUST]: no manifest (0.24.1, 0.25.0)
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.0
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.1

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - frontendDist: ../dist
    - devUrl: http://localhost:1420/
    - framework: React
    - bundler: Vite
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

### Additional context


```bash
mega@wolf ~/P/v/a/project (main)> pnpm tauri icon
thread '<unnamed>' panicked at src/icon.rs:150:5:
Source image must be square
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
mega@wolf ~/P/v/a/project (main)> echo $status
0
```
